attributes.action: Leave the EU on WTA rules
attributes.additional_details:
Teresa May said 
Leave means leave
No deal is better than a bad deal
We will leave on the 29th March 
Us the people say 
Let's make our voice heard and get this vote back on track and LEAVE no body can say what will happen but everyone knows we live in a great country and can overcome any obstacles thrown at us, we cant let this go on and on and any member of parliament that didn't vote for the people that voted LEAVE must be prepared to lose there seat as a MP. Don't let 650 MP's take control of Brexit and force us to LEAVE with a BAD DEAL
attributes.background: When we the people of Britain got the chance to vote leave or stay In the EU we got informed it was once in a generation vote . The people of Britain voted LEAVE democracy and honouring the result is now with parliament and we the people if we are to trust our MP must make our voice heard.
